title: Competency Enhancement Program for Social Studies Instructional Design Using Reusable Learning Objects

context.prior_knowledge: Basic digital literacy and foundational concepts in elementary social education
context.additional_context: A course for in-service elementary educators to acquire RLO creation and utilization methods, aiming to enhance learners' critical thinking and social problem-solving skills

learning_goals: Learners develop the ability to search, select, and reorganize RLOs across diverse digital platforms to align with educational objectives.
Learners develop at least three collaborative learning scenarios using RLOs for student-led learning design.
Learners design RLO-based formative assessment tools to improve learner engagement and achievement by over 20%.

resources: Access rights to public education resource platforms

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
